Commands.name: activate
Commands.description: Activates the given module for this server

Commands.name: deactivate
Commands.description: Deactivates the given module for this server

Commands.name: warn
Commands.description: Gives a warning to the mentioned user

Commands.name: ban
Commands.description: Bans the mentioned user from the server

Commands.name: warnmax
Commands.description: Sets the number of warnings a user must have before being banned to [n]

Commands.name: prefix
Commands.description: Updates the prefix for the server

About: manager allows users to activate and deactivate modules within a server, and change the server prefix for Modis.
Creator: YtnomSnrub
